title: In a Loop that keeps telling me " we have restored this installation to an older version of league "
body: Tried everything up even the Hex-tech repair and reinstalling the game. Running it as an admin doesn't work and nothing that i have found will help me with this plx help don't wanna miss out on URF

replies.body: The loop should be closed now!  The issues earlier today have been resolved, so you should be able to login without issue.
close your client and then change your time on your pc to 1 day and 1 hour backwards to fix it then launch your client!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm having the same problem, and also tried everything.

Then I found an older thread that said set your PC date to yesterday and set your time to one hour earlier. I don't know why, but it works for me and my friend who was having the same problem.
